content:
### EXISTING STRUCTURES

### Furnace at position(x)
Consists of the following entities:
- Furnace (position x)

### Coal extraction point at position(x)
Consists of the following entities:
- Burner mining drill (position x1)

### Iron plate factory at position(x)
Consists of the following entities:
- Assembling machine (position z1) that crafts iron gear wheels
- Furnace (position y1) that smelts iron plates
- Inserter (position a) that puts iron plates into the assembling machine
- Beltgroup (position b) that connects the furnace at position y1 to the assembling machine at position z1

### ERROR TIPS

### Errors related to crafting items
- Ensure you have enough required ingredients in your inventory before attempting to craft items. For example, crafting iron gear wheels requires 2 iron plates, which must be available.

### Errors when using extracting but being too far
- Make sure to move to the target entity where you want to extract from before extracting items.

### Errors when placing into a tile which is occupied by another entity
- Ensure you can place an entity to a tile before attempting to place it.
